Getting Here

Address:

100 Daingerfield Road, Suite 400,
Alexandria, VA 22314

From I-495 (from Virginia)
+

  1. Merge onto I-495 E/I-95 N 4.1 mi
  2. Take exit 176B for Virginia 241 N toward Alexandria 0.7 mi
  3. Take VA-236 E/Duke St to Diagonal Rd 1.0 mi / 3 min
  4. Merge onto Telegraph Rd 0.2 mi
  5. Merge onto VA-236 E/Duke St via the ramp to Downtown/Alexandria 0.6 mi
  6. Turn left onto Diagonal Rd/Dulany St 72 ft
  7. Turn right onto Diagonal Rd Destination will be on the left

From I-495 (from Maryland/the District):

  1. Head west on I-95 S 3.7 mi Passing through District of Columbia Entering Virginia
  2. Take exit 177B-177C for US-1 N toward Alexandria/Mt Vernon 0.1 mi
  3. Take exit 177B on the left to merge onto U.S. 1 N/S Patrick St toward Alexandria 0.7 mi
  4. Turn left onto Duke St 0.4 mi
  5. Turn right onto Daingerfield Rd Destination will be on the left

From I-396:

  1. Head northeast on I-395 N toward Exit 4 1.7 mi
  2. Take exit 5 for VA-7/King St 0.1 mi
  3. Keep right at the fork, follow signs for VA-7 E/King St E and merge onto VA-7 E/King St 2.9 mi
  4. Turn right onto Daingerfield Rd 210 ft Destination will be on the right

From I-95 (from Virginia):

  1. Get on I-95 N 1.2 mi
  2. Follow I-95 N to Telegraph Rd in Alexandria. Take exit 176B from I-95 N 18.4 mi / 18 min
  3. Take VA-236 E/Duke St to Diagonal Rd 1.0 mi / 3 min
  4. Merge onto Telegraph Rd 0.2 mi
  6. Merge onto VA-236 E/Duke St via the ramp to Downtown/Alexandria 0.6 mi
  7. Turn left onto Diagonal Rd/Dulany St 72 ft
  8. Turn right onto Diagonal Rd Destination will be on the left

From I-95 (from Maryland/The District):

  1. Take exit 1C to merge onto I-495 S/I-95 S toward Richmond 2.0 mi Passing through District of Columbia Entering Virginia
  2. Follow I-95 N to Telegraph Rd in Alexandria. Take exit 176B from I-95 N 18.4 mi / 18 min
  3. Take exit 177B-177C for US-1 N toward Alexandria/Mt Vernon 1.0 mi
  4. Take exit 177B on the left to merge onto U.S. 1 N/S Patrick St toward Alexandria Merge onto U.S. 1 N/S Patrick St 0.5 mi
  5. Turn left onto Duke St 0.4 mi
  6. Turn right onto Daingerfield Rd Destination will be on the left

From King Street/Route 7:

  1. Head southeast on King St toward Scroggins Rd 1.5 mi
  2. Turn right onto Daingerfield Rd Destination will be on the right

From Little River Turnpike:

  1. Get on I-495 S/Capital Beltway in Annandale 3.1 mi / 5 min
  2. Follow I-495 S/Capital Beltway and I-95 N to Telegraph Rd in Alexandria
    Take exit 176B from I-95 N 9.9 mi / 10 min
  3. Take VA-236 E/Duke St to Diagonal Rd 1.0 mi / 3 min
  4. Merge onto Telegraph Rd 0.2 mi
  5. Merge onto VA-236 E/Duke St via the ramp to Downtown/Alexandria 0.6 mi
  6. Turn right onto Daingerfield Rd 72 ft
  7. Turn right onto Diagonal Rd Destination will be on the left

Once You're Here:

We are located in the National Community Pharmacists Association building on the fourth floor. Meter parking is available on the street in front of the building along Daingerfield Road, or in the public garage located across from the building entrance at 1700 Diagonal Road, Alexandria.

Phone:

Phone: 703.291.6720
Fax: 703.763.7261

For more information regarding our services, please fill out the below contact form.
